text: 刘老师 is the best teacher I’ve had throughout my schooling years! She is incredibly patient and encouraging, always going above and beyond to engage her students. Her teaching style makes learning Chinese enjoyable and effective. My Chinese skills have improved tremendously thanks to her guidance and dedication, highly recommended!
I remember what a breeze it was to learn and master PSLE Chinese under the patient and effective guidance of 刘老师. Congratulations on your well-deserved opening!🥳🎉
professional and great teacher, taught me higher chinese almost 15 years ago and still remember how I improved so much under her guidance!
